nodes.bodyText: Since this test method now checks that the constructor throws, you can rename this test method
I totally spaced out on the name ! sure thing
If we make this change we need to let PM know before drop it off. lets chat about this

The method signature doesn't change and if someone uses http instead of https, the SSL context will throw an exception. so I don't think there is a behavior change. The exception we throw will be slightly different though.

I took a look through the code, and there are no instances where the SDK would ever pass "http" instead of "https", so there is no impact on our customers here. We aren't taking away http support because we never had http support
